caption.p: Female fecundity (left) and hatch rate (right) in AR wP-M Ae. albopictus in comparison with recipient AR wP and wild-type Ae. albopictus. S = S ANG wild-type Ae. albopictus; AR wP = wPip infected Ae. albopictus; AR wP-M wPip + wMel infected Ae. albopictus. Error bars show the SEM of three biological replicates, each containing 17â€“20 fed females. In both cases, values are not significantly different by ANOVA-Bonferroni (P > 0.05).
